abstract: The buyout group for the unit, one of three main rail car companies in Britain, comprises 3i Group, Morgan Stanley and Star Capital Partners.
snippet: The buyout group for the unit, one of three main rail car companies in Britain, comprises 3i Group, Morgan Stanley and Star Capital Partners.
lead_paragraph: HSBC said on Thursday that it had agreed to sell a train rolling-stock unit, the Eversholt Rail Group, to a private-equity consortium led by the buyout firm 3i Group for £2.1 billion, or $3.3 billion.

headline.main: HSBC Sells Rail Unit to Private Equity for $3.3 Billion
